ygData.subject: RE: Is the 3rd book in the game or not ??
ygData.msgSnippet: It has not yet been determined that it is or is not in the game.  There are rumors on both sides.  If it is in the game then it certainly is not public
ygData.messageBody:
It has not yet been determined that it is or is not in the game. There are
rumors on both sides. If it is in the game then it certainly is not public
knowledge.

-----Original Message-----
From: FizzBan <sragan@...>

Hello Folks,

Is Gimblestones book IX (the 3rd book of tinkering) in the game or not ?

I have heard some folks say that it is, and other folks say that it was
taken out. There is a good chance that if it is in the game, that it
might contain the recipe for the scuba gear.

So anyone with a clue tell me, is the 3rd book really in the game and the
general public just not found it yet? Or does it not even exist.
Thanx,
FizzWizz of tunare
